name: You're The Monster
description:
In this game you play as a little moster trying to avoid death. You need to defend the card. If it gets hit a random event happens. Thank you for playing!

Movement - WASD

Attack - Left Mouse Button

Credit

brullov - fire art - https://brullov.itch.io/

elthen - most sprites - https://elthen.itch.io/
